LanguageData.Make_ARD01.label: Make Rifle-ARD01
LanguageData.Make_ARD01.description: Make the ARD01 tactical rifle, all the raw materials are used 100% of the time.
LanguageData.Make_ARD01_NtoS.label: Set Rifle-ARD01 to 【Safe】
LanguageData.Make_ARD01_NtoS.description: Set Rifle-ARD01 to 【Safe Model】, Many plug-ins need to be replaced and modified.
LanguageData.Make_ARD01_StoN.label: Set Rifle-ARD01 to 【Normal】
LanguageData.Make_ARD01_StoN.description: Set Rifle-ARD01 to 【Normal Model】， Many plug-ins need to be replaced and modified.
